word: Let us study the Word of God. Let us make it a part of our lives, bringing its teachings into the daily experience. Thus only can we gain the knowledge that will enable us, in these days of peril, to distinguish the true from the false. Study the sixth chapter of John. It contains instruction that is indeed the mystery of godliness. "Search the Scriptures," Christ said, "for in them ye think ye have eternal life: and they are they which testify of Me" [John 5:39].
